original_text: Ephron was sitting there with his people, at the city gate. He spoke so that all the Hittites could hear him.
korean_text: 에브론이 헷 족속 중에 앉아 있더니 그가 헷 족속 곧 성문에 들어온 모든 자가 듣는 데서 아브라함에게 대답하여 이르되

sentences.original_text: Ephron was sitting there with his people
sentences.korean_translation: 에브론은 그의 백성들과 함께 그곳에 앉아 있었다

sentences.original_text: so that all the Hittites could hear him
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 헷 족속이 그를 들을 수 있도록
